#  Stoma Bandage Neoprene

__________ (0 Customer reviews)

Stoma belt made from Neoprene

**Größe:**

Größe Choose variant

  * XS/S
  * M/L
  * XL/XXL

Close

__To cart

__Ready for shipping

Suprima &quot;Herzlieb&quot;

  * Add to wish list
  * Questions about product

  * Description
  * Specification
  * Zutaten

__

  * Stomach bandage for ladies and men made of neoprene 
  * the belt can be easily put on and can be adjusted with velcro
  * conceals and fixes the stoma pouch 
  * ideal also for sports and bathing
  * chlorine and salt water resistant
  * fast drying
  * thin material ensures a comfortable fit
  * the neoprene smooth skin inside ensures a non-slip fit on the skin
  * available in different sizes: XS / S (circumference 76-98cm) - M / L (circumference 92-108cm) - XL / XXL (circumference 100-122) - measure the circumference at stoma height
  * colour: black
  * care instructions: do not bleach, do not dry clean, do not iron, do not dry, wash at 40 degrees Celsius

scope of delivery: 1 Stoma bandage Neoprene Size according to choice - see
variants

## Über Cookies auf dieser Website

Dieser Online-Shop verwendet Cookies für ein optimales Einkaufserlebnis. Dabei
werden beispielsweise die Session-Informationen oder die Spracheinstellung auf
Ihrem Rechner gespeichert. Ohne Cookies ist der Funktionsumfang des Online-
Shops eingeschränkt.
